_header: Man be merry I thee rede
_description: A Nativity carol — three quatrains (abab) and 4-line burden: ‘Man be joyfull & myrth þou make / For crist ys made man for thy sake’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Man be mery I the redeBut be whar what merthis þou
                    make…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…And he will sette the wonder hyeFor he ys made man for thy
                    sake
